channel.title: Castle Wars Development Latest Update: Sheeps, Imps, Rabbits
channel.description:
[u][b]Current[/b][/u]
Waiting Room:
v1: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=27xf5ms&s=4 [i]Showing waiting room[/i]
v2: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=13ylzqt&s=4 [i]Added hoods[/i]
v3: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2hgycr4&s=4 [i]Some more features[/i]
v4: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=zxs4dd&s=4 [i]Animals: Needs Improvement[/i]
[ul][li] I have to send a message like in RuneScape, how the god tells you they've turned you into an animal.[/li] [li] Need to fix emotes a little although they're good right now.[/li] [li] Add sheep grazing, add rabbit looking around.[/li] [li] Remove inventory and tools tab[/li][/ul]
Game: Not started
[u][b]Info[/b][/u]
Look at the video.
I used a different class for the timer, so it stays the same.
Even teams.
Since everyone was making crappy castle wars I decided to do the real thing.
